body_html:
Windows failures are occurring because of following error:
c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\tensorflow-pr-win-cmake-py\tensorflow\core\platform\cpu_info.h(23): error C2065: '__ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN__': undeclared identifier (compiling source file C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\tensorflow-pr-win-cmake-py\tensorflow\core\platform\file_system.cc)

This change was added as per aselle's review comment in our earlier PR.

@aselle , any inputs on how to make it work on Windows?

body:
Windows failures are occurring because of following error:
`c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\tensorflow-pr-win-cmake-py\tensorflow\core\platform\cpu_info.h(23): error C2065: '__ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN__': undeclared identifier (compiling source file C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\tensorflow-pr-win-cmake-py\tensorflow\core\platform\file_system.cc)`

This change was added as per aselle's  [review comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/4508/files#r81671579) in our earlier PR.

@aselle , any inputs on how to make it work on Windows?
